title: Blocking Attacks
content: A well-timed block can negate damage and also restore your stamina. Press {Shield} just as an enemy's attack is about to land to perform a block.

title: Minimap Navigation
content: Lost? Open your minimap with {Minimap}. You can middle-click on the map to pin a location, creating a path to guide you.

title: Crafting Basics
content: Gather materials like ores and herbs from the world. Visit a Crafting Table to combine them into powerful new gear.
